newsitem.title: USA: Information Management files for share offering.
newsitem.headline: Information Management files for share offering.

text.p: Information Management Resources Inc on Thursday said the company and two of its executives planned to sell three million of its common shares.

In filing with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission, the company said it would offer 1.5 million shares. Satish Sanan, its chairman, chief executive and principal shareholder, will offer 1.35 million and Jeffery Slowgrove, its treasurer, 150,000 shares.

It said Montgomery Securities, Alex Brown & Sons Inc, Furman Selz LLC and Raymond James & Associates Inc would underwrite the offering, with an option for 450,000 additional shares to cover over-allotments.

Information Management said it would use net proceeds to establish new offshore software development facilities and for working capital and other general corporate purposes, including capital expenditures and possible acquisitions.
The company, which provides applications software outsourcing service to large businesses, said it would not receive any proceeds from shares sold by the selling shareholders.
